attributes.action: Pressure US and Saudi governments to cease genocidal blockade of Yemen.
attributes.additional_details: The man made crises in Yemen have reached a fever pitch, becoming the most severe humanitarian crisis in recorded history. The UK is complicit in these events (including war crimes), through our political and financial support of the principal perpetrators: The United States of America and Saudi Arabia.
attributes.background:
Formally address, debate and review current UK support of American and Saudi action in Yemen. Consider our contributions to the ongoing atrocity, in the form of arms trade, cooperation etc.

Formally declare the situation a genocide.
